definition: Baoshan prefecture-level city in Yunnan
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Baoshan prefecture-level city in Yunnan
Baoshan prefecture in Yunnan

sentences.english: Comprehensive(or Integrated) Department, Boshan Oriental Tobacco Limited liability company, Yunnan Tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 雲南菸草保山香料煙有限責任公司綜合部英語怎麼說？

sentences.english: Baoshan is reputed as a most comfortable place for human habitation.
sentences.chinese: 保山被譽爲最適宜人類居住的地區。

sentences.english: What do you think of Baoshan?
People of different ethnic groups live in harmony in Baoshan.
sentences.chinese: 在保山，各族人民和諧相處。

sentences.english: Baoshan has long been reputed as the "Grand Barn in West Yunnan".
sentences.chinese: 保山在很長時間曾被稱爲“滇西糧倉”。

sentences.english: Baoshan is rich in forest resources, known as "the Kingdom of the Plant Kingdoms".
sentences.chinese: 保山森林資源豐富，被譽爲“植物王國中的王國”。

sentences.english: Baoshan has many places of interest.
Baoshan has been designated by the Provincial Government as the Central City in the Frontier Economic Area in West Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 保山被雲南省政府確定爲滇西邊境經濟區的中心城市。

sentences.english: Baoshan has become a commonly acknowledged spot of interest with rich cultural implications for tourists.
sentences.chinese: 保山已成爲具有豐富內涵的健康旅遊目的地。
